title: Hawaii 501: Life as a Darts Pro
description: A year in the life of darts' most flamboyant player, Romford legend Wayne Mardle - leading up to and including his epic World Championship semi-final with Phil Taylor. From the passion and drama of the Circus Tavern to the loneliness of practice and an obsession with on-line poker and koi carp, this is a fascinating and funny insight into a sporting life fuelled by double vodkas and KFC.
author: Wayne Mardle
